lines.text: You are so gullible, that if someone said, "it's chilly outside," you'd grab a bowl.
[If you touch the phone in Stauf's kitchen]
If you want to make a call, hang yourself and try again.
[about Carl Denning, who is a TV reporter]
I can see why you'd make a good anchor. All that dead weight between your ears!
Not even in the ball park! In fact, not even game day.
A lot of intermarriage in your family, stupid?
I took a picture of your brain.
